stripped_text: Once per turn -> When you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Once per turn → When you rez a piece of ice during a run against this server, you may derez another installed piece of ice. If you do, the rezzed ice gets +3 strength for the remainder of that run. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Brasília Government Grid
